name: SET OF 2 MOROCCAN LEATHER POUFS ( White with Grey stitching )
description: Elegant Set of 2 white Moroccan leather poufs with grey stitching and embroidery made with first grade genuine goat leather ( these poufs are made from different leather qualities : the goat first grade leather is the best one mainly for its durability and flexibility ) . These poufs are hand-dyed and hand-stitched and embroidered . Moroccan poufs are a great choice for any interior. Buttery-soft, these hand-dyed leather poufs are extremely adaptable, serving as ottomans, low tables and cozy floor cushions. Moroccan poufs can be placed around a coffee table, in front of your fireplace, , or in your kids room for instant chic and neighbor-envy !!! they provide a decorative place for guests and family members to perch or put up their feet offering a great relaxation.. When they are not in use, they add color and texture to the room. This pouf is similar to those featured in reputed stores such as : http://www.johnderian.com/imports/poufs.html Please note that your moroccan poufs will be DELEVERED TO YOU UNSTUFFED ( for cost effective shipping), so you can use polystyrene balls or cotton filling , you can also use old cloths or towels to make them as firm or as soft as you want them .**** Size : 13" height X 20'' diameter ( 33 cm h X 50 cm d ) you can take a look at what some people who purchased those poufs think about them here: PURCHASERS TESTIMONIAL NOTE : YOUR ITMEM WILL BE SHIPPED TO YOU IN 1 TO 3 WORKING DAYS AFTER RECEIVING THE PAYMENT ( processing time ). YOU WILL BE NOTIFIED ONCE THE SHIPPEMENT IS DONE WITH PROOF OF SHIPPEMENT AND TRACKING NUMBER;
